input.sentences: the first thing we did on our vacation was ride the horses .
we rode right through town viewing enormous structures and the people all along the way .
then we went for a hike .
once we reached the top we laid there with arms spread open .
last | but not least | we went to a symphony . the entire trip was surreal and i ca n't wait to go back someday .
output.sentences: we saw people riding horses in the street.
we saw large old grey stone buildings.
After that we stood at the edge of a cliff
Then one of us lied in the middle of a forest on the path
Next we sat in the back of a theater to watch a live play onstage
